title: Burst meta summarized in one video
body:

replies.body: Riot must have a boner watching this.

it will create a tank meta

hahahaha
Tank meta was a mistake and instead of sitting down and fixing the problems they created they just added dmg to everything else and thats this video.

any meta is a mistake, the best meta would be a meta where no class is mandatory

what i'm talking about is that there were people who said that if you nerf damage, you get a tank meta

when in reality anyone surviving 2 more seconds would NOT create a tank meta

if a tank and a carry both survive 2 more seconds, nobody ends up better
Make tanks tanky while dealing low damage. Problem solved. Too hard for the imbeciles over at Riot games tho.
issue is tanks need dmg to jungle and lane

I said low damage not no damage, tanks certainly do not need their current level of damage. As it stands tanks are currently not very tanky and can pretty much burst squishy champs.

If tanks need damage for jungle you can simply put X does +% damage to minions and monsters on their spells. Pretty simple solution.

> if a tank and a carry both survive 2 more seconds, nobody ends up better

That would violate the survivability ratio between tanks and carries, meaning the carries would end up better.
that makes sense, but at the end of the day it still means it won't result in a tank meta

And they have the guts to tell you that the damage hasn't changed much these past years and append the irrelevant total damage dealt chart comparison.

Thank you for posting this video. It really sums up the reason why I stopped playing summoner's rift.

The reason the “total damage dealt chart” has remained the same over the years... is because the amount of HP in the game has remained relatively the same.. You can’t burst more than there is hp... If 5 players all up have 15khp? Only 15k damage can happen in a fight.. 

The issue is how fast that 15k is happening these days, compared to older days, and the answer is: much much faster

Rito is too stupid to realise this.

I had two watch this twice to actually figure out what the fuck happened. 
Unless if you have the reactions of a god and you are the most proactive and aggressive fuck around...you aren't surviving that.

There are pros and cons to both of these states, but what you're saying is ignorant. Is there not skill in being able to get fed, and push that advantage into a win?
